comment: An easy A as long as you do the work and attend most of the classes you will get an A. Lets you makeup stuff within reasonable time, very knowledgeable and overall a great guy. Lectures are boring but you learn a good bit once you get into the swing of things. He does change due dates without posting on d2l, so if you miss class you might miss that
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback

comment: This is the first professor at KSU I have loved. He is so chill with everything, and helps you out whenever you need help. My class was from 6:30-9:30, but he always let us out around 8 or before. Just get all your work done and don't be behind, and I guarantee you will get an A. He's great!! :)

SInce no one rated, I'll be the first. Compared to the other teachers, Prof. Turner is VERY laid back. He is very straightforward with the HW and Inclass-Assignments. Though the class is 3hrs long, we usually leave early. He reviews for exams and quiz, and his tests are pretty simple, still study terms! Only downside is its a night class ;-;
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria
